content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The rental price of my apartment is €1,000. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. Would you consider €450?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Unfriendly] €450 is far too low for my apartment. I can consider €700.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that €700 is still high for me. How about €600? I'm willing to pay a little more, but I can't afford more than that.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Unfriendly] €600 is still too low for my apartment. I can consider €650 as the lowest.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding. I'm willing to pay €650, but I can't afford more than that. I hope this is acceptable for you.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Unfriendly] I agree to the price of [x] €650!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Good, I'm glad we could find a price that works for both of us. The rental price for the apartment is €650, and we will not continue negotiating the price. If there are no issues with this price, we can proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Unfriendly] I agree to the price of [x] €650!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Since we have agreed on the rental price, I will prepare the lease agreement for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
